preface.p: This is a free/open-source textbook that provides an introduction to Linear Algebra. There is a light emphasis on mathematical proof and a strong emphasis on applications, making this book appropriate for science and engineering majors and for mathematics majors who are taking Linear Algebra early in their college careers. Math majors who have already had an introduction to proofs course may benefit from the more advanced treatment in Robert Beezer's "A First Course in Linear Algebra."
